thread.section_title: Coopmanhuijs Boutique Hotel & Spa - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Stellenbosch, South Africa) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Central location - great staff
thread.title_full: Central location - great staff - Review of Coopmanhuijs Boutique Hotel & Spa, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: Graeme H
title: Central location - great staff
text:
Would recommend overall. Only issue is we like a lazy morning and were woke early by hotel setting up for the day - so advice to go but avoid ground floor room by the pool. Staff were really polite. Really good help in valeting car and in general.
Room Tip: As above - avoid by pool. See more room tips
